features: 🎥【4K & 48MP Digital Camera with Autofocus】The 4K digital camera auto focus feature ensures that the 4K videos are sharp and clear, while the 48MP image resolution delivers crisp and vibrant images, allowing you to capture every detail with impressive clarity.

📷【Optical Viewfinder & Flash】The optical viewfinder of vlogging camera enables real-time composition and reduces the impact of external light on photography, which helps you capture the perfect shots every time. The flash feature of 4K digital video camera provides ample illumination to take clear photos in low-light conditions.

🎒【Rotary Button & Lightweight Camera with Case】The vintage digital camera comes with a leather protective camera case, which protect the lens and body from getting scratched. Just carry the pocket-sized camera around your neck and open the cover to start shooting securely. The intuitive interface and well-labeled rotary buttons of photography camera make it efficient to navigate through the settings to suit different shooting conditions.

💻【Webcam & HDMI Transmission】The 4K digital camera for vlogging can also be used as a webcam for streaming on social media platforms. The point and shoot digital camera can be connected to a TV or computer for viewing and fast uploading, expanding its usability beyond traditional photography purposes.

👪【Well-suited for Beginners and Vloggers】Whether you're a vlogger, travel photographer, or sports enthusiast, this vlogging camera offers the versatility you need for vlogging, YouTube, TikTok and other video production needs. This is a perfect gift for someone that wants a digital travel camera that is a great companion for outdoor adventures, vacations, or simply capturing precious moments with friends and family.

☎️【Multiple Functions & Reliable Customer Support】 The camera for photography is featured with 16x zoom, anti-shake, self-timer, time-lapse shooting, slow-motion shots, continuous shooting and pause function for video recording, making it suitable for various shooting needs. If any issue you have encountered, please don't hesitate to contact us, we are responsive to provide 18-month replacement and lifetime reliable warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Our 4K Digital Camera for Photography is a Great Companion for Starters, Vloggers, Photography Enthusiasts, Content Creators? 4K Video & 48MP Picture: The high-quality image and video quality allows for stunning visuals with rich details.Auto Focus & 16x Zoom: Captures precise shots without compromising on detail, both up close and at a distance.Lightweight with a Digital Camera Case: Makes it easy to carry around in leather case without feeling bulky.Optical Viewfinder: Allows for better framing and composition, and see clearly in bright outdoor conditions.Rotary Button: Quickly switches between different modes with ease, make the handling smooth and efficient.Pause Function for Video Recording: Useful for vloggers, saving valuable editing time.Hot Shoe：Connects an external flash as well as a microphone.As a Webcam: Use it for video calls, live streaming, and online teaching. Package List : 1x 4K Digital Camera, 1x Leather Case, 1x 32GB Micro SD Card, 2x Rechargeable Batteries, 1x HDMI Cable, 1x Type-C USB Cable & Power Adapter, 1x Lens Cap, 1x Neck Strap, 1x User Manual.

The Rotary Button Ensures You Never Miss a Moment Warm Tips: 1. The digital camera supports Max 128GB card (32GB Card Included). 2. Please insert Micro SD card to take and save photos, and format card on the camera setup before using for the first time. (Tips: Please plug camera into the outlet by the power cord to format it.) 3. Be sure that the three terminals of battery align with the terminals at the bottom of the battery cavity. (Tips: The red light is on (not faintly blink) when the battery was charged fine, the light will be off after fully charged.) 4. Please try an SD card reader if the MSDC doesn't show up when import the photos to computer by USB cable. 5. You have to reset the date and time when you replace the rechargeable battery. 6. Press shutter button halfway down to auto focus, the yellow focus rectangle will turn green.

The Various Features Provide Creative Possibilities for Shooting, Allowing You to Explore Different Styles 16X Zoom & Auto Focus Whether you’re shooting outdoor landscapes or close-ups, the 4K digital camera with upgraded processor and CMOS image sensor delivers high-definition images and video. Digital Camera Leather Case The protective leather case for digital camera prevents the lens getting scratches, you can pop the cover off to take pictures so it feel secure and convenient any time you use it. Optical Viewfinder The optical viewfinder focuses on target and minimizes the impact of outdoor light when take photos, which allows you to see exactly what you're capturing in a very bright outside.

Anti Shake The anti-shake feature of vlogging camera produces smooth and stable footage while moving, which is beneficial for vloggers who are engaging in outdoor activities. Built-in Flash The camera for photography is equipped with built-in flash lighting up the scene, enabling you to capture clear shots even when natural lighting is insufficient. Smile Recognition The point and shoot digital camera automatically take a photo when capturing smile, it is useful for you to want to get the one moment someone grins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great low cost camera
reviews.reviewText: Ok, here is my review on the camera after using it. On first sight everything you need to get rolling does come with the box, which makes set up a breeze to get playing with your new camera. I do that I must mention this was after having the two unit replaced due to faulty batteries and software, however, the consumer service was probably the best I have experienced so far. Now that’s out of the way the camera is a good bang for your buck. Is it a iPhone camera? No! But it’s still take good quality photos.Pros:1. The zoom does great and the clarity of the photos are clear and not pixelated2. Comes with a cool carrying case, two batteries and lenses cover.3. Takes cool photos and easily accessible with the SD card4. Light weight to carry with the case strap.5. Case protects the camera against fall.6. Comes with two batters and SD cardCons:1. No flip out screen of your into like vlogging and recording yourself2. No Wi-fi for wireless printing and uploading3. No separate battery changing option to have the back up battery charged if one die.All in all it’s a solid camera for the buck. Great for beginner photography or hobby like activities. Understanding the great quality and customer service that comes with the camera is a no brainer. I would 10/10 recommend the camera to anyone who is looking for a good budget camera. I would give the camera a solid 8.5/10. The functionality is really easy to use also for those who might not be as tech savvy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile Camera For All Occasions
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This camera reminds me of the good old days of film cameras. But there’s a LOT more to it than in times past. I had been using an old Olympus digital camera, but the memory cards weren’t available any more, and it finally bit the dust. I was looking to get another camera I could use whenever the situation presented itself. I do have an expensive camera, but it’s got so many attachments it’s hard to justify bringing it on a simple hike or a family gathering. This fills the bill and then some. It has all the digital effects you expect in a digital camera, like zoom and options like sepia, black and white, negative and many more. All the different settings for taking still pictures and videos are available to optimize your results, such as ISA, white balance, resolution, super sharp or blended focus, etc. More than I could describe here. The supplied memory card is more than enough to cover any photo shoot, but for about $20 you can get a 128 Gig micro SD card which you can use for long videos without worrying about running out of room. And you can select the resolution you want to conserve space if you need to. My old Olympus did not have sound, but this one does so you can film that birthday or beach party and capture all the excitement. Input for an external microphone is available if you want to do interviews or make high quality YouTube videos. A USB connection port is available to download your photos or videos, but I prefer to remove the SD card and put it directly into my computer. The 4k videos from this thing are amazing. I have a large screen monitor, and all the images look great! The colors are vibrant and clear, very lifelike. The battery life is very good, and you get an extra battery included. Included are aneck strap and carrying straps in addition to a leatherette cover. A few things I wish this was capable of are a close-up photo mode, external lenses, etc., but this camera is not really going to compete with the latest Canon or Nikon expensive professional cameras a photographer would use. This is a point-and-shoot camera that will probably have more use than those other ones because it’s so easy to use. Once you set it up, just hit the power button and you’re ready to shoot. You can view the subject from the big screen on the back, or look in the viewfinder to compose your shots. After taking your photos, you can show them on the screen, zoom in on the images, delete them, etc. Same for the videos.All in all, this is a very good option for saving those precious moments that seem to come as a surprise. You always have it ready when the time is right. The price is reasonable for what you get. I love this thing, and I recommend it to anyone who wants a good quality digital camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Digital, Feature rich, nostalgic but no Wi-Fi capability
reviews.reviewText: I bought this 4K digital camera about 4 weeks ago so I could have a dedicated camera for my vlog. It has a blend of vintage aesthetics and modern technology. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the stylish leather carrying case which visually sets this camera apart from anything other modern cameras I’ve seen recently around this price point. Since the camera offers a unique combination of manual and automatic features, making it versatile for both amateur and experienced photographers, it was a good choice for me with my intermediate skills.The Viewfinder and 16X Zoom with Autofocus make it easy for a non-professional photographer (like me) to easily snap pics. With 48MP it’s more than enough to make my vlogging footage standout, plus it being point and shoot makes it’s super easy to use for non-techie content creators.The camera comes with a drawstring protective pouch, a lanyard, a 32G card, 2 batteries, and a convenient USB cable for charging, which is handy when I’m on-the-go or I haven’t charged the backup battery. A 32G SD Card is provided so you can unbox this camera quickly and be ready to go! It camera has a HD, USB Type-C, and Mic input ports, perfect for capturing high-quality audio and video. The lightweight design makes it a travel-friendly companion. It won’t add unnecessary weight to your bag, allowing you to take it with you wherever you go.While it’s marketed as an excellent choice for vlogging, it’s worth noting that it lacks Wi-Fi capability. This means you’ll need a way to transfer your media off the SD card to a laptop, tablet, PC, Mac, or phone. Fortunately, there are various options available, including cables and adapters. Personally, I use an adapter that resembles a jump drive, connecting it to my iPhone and utilizing the SD slot for seamless transfers.Despite the absence of Wi-Fi connectivity, this camera shines in terms of its software and hardware. It offers a ton of filters, modes, and settings, catering to different photography styles and preferences. Additionally, it features a mounting connection point on the bottom on of the camera and the leather case (a design I haven’t seen with other digital cameras).Most notably for me is this camera provides separation from your phone. It serves as a dedicated device allowing me to focus solely on photography or videography without distractions.I recommend this nostalgic 4K digital camera with vintage charm, manual and automatic capabilities, and a range of accessories as a solid choice for influencers, vloggers, or e-commerce business owners who need to photograph and/or video daily. While the lack of Wi-Fi might be an inconvenience, it’s a feature rich camera and that makes up for it. I think it would be a valuable tool for content creators and photography enthusiasts alike.
Imágenes de pésima calidad. Ni siquiera puedo entender la configuración. El manual de instrucciones no sirve para nada. ¡Qué malgasto de dinero! Este es básicamente un juguete para niños.

reviews.reviewTitle: Brings back the memories of the digital cameras that I used to use back in mid 2000s
reviews.reviewText: It's been a while since I've used a digital camera as almost everyone just uses their cellphones to take pictures/videos. I, as well, also just got used to taking pics/videos using my phone but I started having some itch in getting back to the days of digital cameras so I started looking for one. There were many of them available on Amazon but I found this product to be especially more appealing as it had a semi-vintage design of the digital cameras back in the mid 2000s. On top of the semi-vintage design appeal, it adds the 4K tech which is what I exactly wanted on a traditional digital camera. I remember when I used to buy digital cameras back in those days, it used to have a price tag of around $150-200 (if I remember correctly), and guess what, this camera is still around the same price range with brand new tech all added onto it, which is amazing.Another thing that I wanna talk about is the overall design and construction of the camera. I love how each function can be selected using the rotary wheel that makes it very easy to swipe through different functions (nowadays a lot of the cameras like GoPro have really finicky controls which makes it difficult to even navigate through menus and functions but in contrast, the wheel makes it very convenient). Aside from the wheel control, the overall weight is very manageable to carry around and it never bothered me for about a week of usage.I can't really speak for the vlogging perspective as I am not a vlogger nor a content creator, but I can see how this can be a very good option at a very reasonable price point for anyone getting into content-creating.Currently, I am using the camera to take pictures of products for my business and so far, the images have been flawlessly clear and sharp so that it makes my products look a lot better than my past pictures that I used to take with my cellphone camera.If anyone's in the market for a brand new camera, take this one in a heartbeat. Awesome quality camera with complimentary accessories like the cool-looking case with battery and a memory card. I think this is definitely in the top position in the category.

reviews.reviewTitle: Charming old looks with future tech
reviews.reviewText: In a world of sleek, modern gadgets, this 4K Digital Camera stands out with its retro charm and antique leather case. This camera is not just a nostalgic nod to the past; it's also packed with cutting-edge features that will leave even the most discerning photographer impressed. Picture Perfection in 4K With its ability to capture stunning 4K videos and 48MP photos, this camera is a true powerhouse. The images are sharp, vibrant, and full of detail, making it perfect for capturing those special moments with family and friends. Effortless Auto Focus and 16x Zoom Never miss a shot again with the camera's lightning-fast autofocus and impressive 16x zoom. Whether you're capturing a close-up of a delicate flower or a sweeping vista of a mountain range, this camera will help you get the perfect shot every time. Lightweight and Portable Despite its impressive features, this camera is surprisingly lightweight and portable. It comes with a stylish leather case that protects the camera while adding to its vintage appeal. A True Photographer's Tool This camera is not just for casual snapshots; it's packed with features that will appeal to serious photographers. The optical viewfinder allows for better framing and composition, even in bright outdoor conditions. The rotary button makes it easy to switch between different modes, and the pause function for video recording is a godsend for vloggers. A Great Gift for the Holidays This camera is the perfect gift for anyone who loves photography. It's a great way to encourage creativity and capture memories that will last a lifetime. My Conclusion: The 4K Digital Camera is a rare gem that combines the charm of the past with the technology of the future. It's a camera that will be cherished for years to come.
Todavía no se como quitarle la funda para insertar baterías y micro SD. Estorba el botón para tripié.

This camera has left me thoroughly impressed with its photo and video capabilities. The camera itself has a premium feel to it, with a body made of good quality materials yet lightweight which makes it easy to handle especially when taking videos with one hand. The camera quality is stunning especially for videos which was the primary purpose that I got this camera. The 4K video is crystal clear and sharp especially when displayed on a 4K screen. A nice touch is the added accessories which include a leather case, strap, extra batteries and a 32gb. Overall I am quite pleased with how this camera has turned out. For the price, it’s a no brainer for anyone looking for an affordable yet high quality camera
